name: boba cat amigurumi
notes:
free pattern can be found in my website : https://littleloveeveryday.com/boba-cat-amigurumi-pattern/

boba cat amigurumi pattern by a little love everyday!

this pdf pattern for boba cat amigurumi is written in us crochet terms and available in english.

skill level: easy/intermediate

the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge. you should be familiar with:
- magic ring
- single crochet
- half double crochet.
- increase
- invisible decrease
- working in front and back loops.
- invisible fasten off
- slip stitch

materials you will need:
- sport weight cotton yarn in pink, white and blue.
- 2 mm crochet hook (or the size you need depending on yarn you use).
- polyester stuffing.
- 6 mm safety eyes/ flat back eyes.
- tapestry needle.
- small piece of cardboard.
- small amount of felt in brown/black colour.
- pipe cleaner (optional).

size : the finished doll measures around 5 inches tall and 2.5 inches wide. you are welcome to use any yarn of different thickness. the sizes may vary according to the yarn and hook you use.

hope you will enjoy crocheting this cute boba cat as much as i did :)
